skillTree.name: The Endless Hunters
skillTree.description: Waystalkers are no more than their next hunt. Every breath advances their chase, bringing them closer to victory.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +15% during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Ward of Loec
skillTree.description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.

skillTree.name: Ward of Hoeth
skillTree.description: Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.

skillTree.name: Endurance
skillTree.description: When it comes to the art of survival, there's no one who can match Kalara's finely-honed abilities.

effects.description:
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.name: The Hunt
skillTree.description: Only few can receive blessing of mighty God of the Hunt.

skillTree.name: Arrow of Kurnous
skillTree.description: When the arrow flies farther, it may kill sooner, which is vital in the Hunt.

ui_effects.description: Requires line of sight to the target

skillTree.name: Fleetfinger
skillTree.description: Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.

skillTree.name: Piercing Shots
skillTree.description: The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.

skillTree.name: Bottomless Quiver
skillTree.description: Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Prey of Anath Raema
skillTree.description: By all means summon the bloodthirsty Goddess of the Hunt to assist you, but always make sure you thank her afterwards…

skillTree.name: Swordplayer
skillTree.description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.

skillTree.name: Endurance of the Oak
skillTree.description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.

skillTree.name: Tempered Rigour
skillTree.description: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Scouting Ahead
skillTree.description: Once the sun sets, the Waystalker leaves camp, returning before dawn to deliver their report.

skillTree.name: Cleanse the Forest
skillTree.description: The enemies of Athel Loren will fall.

skillTree.name: Sabotage
skillTree.description: Waystalkers move unseen, unheard, and unnoticed.

skillTree.name: Pick Them Off
skillTree.description: Our arrows can kill from any distance.

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: The perils of Athel Loren are far greater than the pathetic machinations of mortals.

skillTree.name: The Eye of Kurnous
skillTree.description: The Lord sets their eye upon the foe, imbuing their troops with Kurnous' spirit and the will to see his enemies destroyed.

skillTree.name: Sight Beyond Sight
skillTree.description: Waystalkers’ keen eyes can spot an enemy at a distance that defies belief, and so they demand the same of their troops.

skillTree.name: Hidden Paths
skillTree.description: There is always another way.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Disciple
skillTree.description: Useful, if a bit impetuous.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +1% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Notorious
skillTree.description: It’s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.

skillTree.name: Contacts
skillTree.description: Sometimes it’s best to have friends in low places.

skillTree.name: Shadow
skillTree.description: Always watching.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +2%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +4%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush success chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

Ambush defence chance: +8%
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.name: Grandmaster
skillTree.description: They’ve all heard the stories of this one’s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +1%
	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 25
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 100

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Jungle Spirit
backgroundSkills.description: Kalara moves swiftly, almost unseen, with a sleekness of purpose as well as motion.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Ariel's Chosen
backgroundSkills.description: Those whom the Mage Queen has favoured fight as if powered by her hand.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +10% when increasing

Melee attack: +2 during forest battles
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Talon of Kurnous
backgroundSkills.description: The first arrow of battle must fly truest.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
